action.description: The committee on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Kila, Grandinetti, Evslin, Kitagawa, Miyake; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Muraoka, Pierick;  Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran, La Chica.
